name: The Sex Game: Dice! FREE
description:
***This is a Free Version of The Sex Game: Dice ***
The Game Game: Dice is a game created for the for the amusement of the couple!
The game contains several erotic dices, including the option to create your own pair of dices.
In this first version of the game, it's already includes 16 pairs of dices with the most diverse actions to increase your enjoyment and pleasure with your partner!
Spice up your relationship!
Enjoy and have fun!
